description._content: Description: Village of Siloam. Location: Siloam, Palestine Date: 1918 Description: View, from Old City, of the Kedron Valley and Mount of Olives, showing the Garden of Gethsemane (marked +) Blue line refers to Scheme. Location: Palestine Date: 1918 Description: Village of Bethany. Location: Bethany, Palestine Date: 1918 Description: View from Gordon's Calvary of Old City and Mount of Olives (Note the building on sky line). Location: Palestine Date: 1918 Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/743 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
